'''''Other Hands'' 8''' is an issue of ''[[Other Hands]]'', a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing|MERP]]''.

* '''Published:''' January [[1995]]

==Contents==
*Editorial: vision or illusion? - [[Chris Seeman]]
*Communications - Pablo Ginés Rodriguez, Bernie Roessler, Dirk Brandherm
*Frontlines - [[Chris Seeman]]
*The religious rituals of the Dúnedain of Gondor - Michael R. Hickman
*The lost realm of Myr - Deena McKinney
*The Knife of Betrayal - Jeff A. Hatch
*The Legacy of Calimendil - Torquil Gault
*Product Review: Palantír Quest - Gerrit Nuckton
*Product Review: Moria - Greg Bailey
